section.p: Confirmation has been sent to email address .
To change your sumbmission please use this page (this link is also available in confirmation email). Note that you can always use remind option on the main registraion page.
The only method of payment is bank transfer (free of charge for the beneficiary) to the account owned by Polskie Stowarzyszenie dla Maszyn Liczących in:
Bank Zachodni WBK S.A. IV/O Wrocław ul. Kuźnicza 17/19 Wrocław
Make sure your name appears on the bank transfer.
Registrations after August 5 will be considered late. The regular fee will be 550 euro, and the students fee 400 euro, in the case of late registration.
Cancellation must be made in writing (letter or fax) before August 15, 2004. No fees will be refunded after this date. A processing fee of 100 euro will be deducted from all refunds.
